thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Megan

author: Megan
title: Megan
text: Ordered some sunglasses for my husband as a birthday present and was concerned if they would arrive in time as we are in Canada. Well they arrived 5 days later! I was very impressed and my husband loves them. My only criticism would be I never received a follow up email to the email I got when I ordered them that said my order status would be updated in 3-5 days, so I was becoming worried they would arrive in time (thinking they hadn't shipped yet). Little did I know they had and arrived just days later.
